word:
Christ has taught us to pray, "Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth as it is in heaven." This opens to us a height to which we are to attain by steady progression and continual advancement. If all would do unto others as they would that others should do to them, it would be an indication of a converted world. Upon this principle the Christian is to 


                                                         119. 

build. We are to ascend a ladder of progress whose top reaches unto heaven.
